content: When will we be able to search on the fhir.org registries to find IG that have profiled by the resource profiled? When one is writing a new IG, it is very helpful to find all previous profiles on the resource they are looking to profile, so that they can re-use rather than re-invent that profile. Say for example I am looking to profile "Patient" resource, I should be able to find all others that have profiled Patient, and from that find the Implementation Guides that did the profile (or are using the profile).
Working on getting registry.fhir.org to do this. You can do this now on registry.fhir.org now using the FHIR Toolkit

John, on Simplifier you can do this:
https://simplifier.net/CoreProfilesSTU3/Patient/~references?filters=inbound|external&referenceTypes=Base

well, I am "asking for a friend"... the point is that we are starting to get a far more diverse set of people jumping into creation of iG. I am looking for simple way they can check to see if there is prior profiling in that space. So, please make it more easy to find prior profiling so that we can drive re-use rather than re-invention.
